description: standing figure wearing heavy, long drapery; figure stands in profile from PR, with head turned to PR; bottom half of face delineated, but not finished
provenance: [Herbert Feist, New York, until 1973; sold November 30, for $1,275, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Standing Male Figure
